verses.text:
Have mercy on me, my God, have mercy on me,
    for in you I take refuge.
I will take refuge in the shadow of your wings
    until the disaster has passed.

I cry out to God Most High,
    to God, who vindicates me.

He sends from heaven and saves me,
    rebuking those who hotly pursue me窶能n    God sends forth his love and his faithfulness.

Be exalted, O God, above the heavens;
    let your glory be over all the earth.

They spread a net for my feet窶能n    I was bowed down in distress.
They dug a pit in my path窶能n    but they have fallen into it themselves.

Awake, my soul!
    Awake, harp and lyre!
    I will awaken the dawn.

I will praise you, Lord, among the nations;
    I will sing of you among the peoples.

For great is your love, reaching to the heavens;
    your faithfulness reaches to the skies.

Be exalted, O God, above the heavens;
    let your glory be over all the earth.
